Reviews.Title: Non durable phone
Reviews.Author: Aldo Agraz "aagraz"
Reviews.Content: I bought this cell phone 1 year ago and everything went all right untill last month when I found that the touch screen went all white and I couldn't do anything with it. I sent the phone to HTC's RMA department, they said the LCD was brocken and repaired it for no warranty. I received the phone back and 3 weeks later my screen is once again white and can't do anything with it. I really don't recomment this brand because I always treated the phone good so I don't see I am responsible for the fail.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME PHONE!!!
Reviews.Author: Cesar Rodriguez "..."
Reviews.Content: Incredible Machine. 100% with all features. I can listen "stereo" music with my HT820 bluetooth. HTC Rules!

ProductInfo.Name: HTC Touch P3450 -Gsm- Cell Phone (Unlocked) Tri Band
